00051     inline
00052     void
00053     UContextImpl::yield_for(libport::utime_t delay) const
00054     {
00055       return yield_until(libport::utime() + delay);
00056     }
00057 
00058 
00059     template<typename T> void
00060     deletor(T* ptr)
00061     {
00062       delete ptr;
00063     }
00064 
00065     template<typename T> void
00066     UContextImpl::addCleanup(T* ptr)
00067     {
00068       cleanup_list_->back().push_back(boost::bind(&deletor<T>, ptr));
00069     }
00070 
00071     inline void
00072     UContextImpl::pushCleanupStack()
00073     {
00074       CleanupList* cl = cleanup_list_.get();
00075       if (!cl)
00076       {
00077         cl = new CleanupList;
00078         cleanup_list_.reset(cl);
00079       }
00080       cl->resize(cl->size()+1);
00081     }
00082 
00083     inline void
00084     UContextImpl::popCleanupStack()
00085     {
00086       // I would rather not define 'foreach' in a hxx.
00087       BOOST_FOREACH(boost::function0<void>& f, cleanup_list_->back())
00088         f();
00089       cleanup_list_->pop_back();
00090     }
00091 
00092     inline
00093     UContextImpl::CleanupStack::CleanupStack(UContextImpl& owner)
00094     : owner_(owner)
00095     {
00096       owner_.pushCleanupStack();
00097     }
00098 
00099     inline
00100     UContextImpl::CleanupStack::~CleanupStack()
00101     {
00102       owner_.popCleanupStack();
00103     }
00104   }
00105 
00106 }
